p: A total of 51 samples were divided into 17 groups, each of which contained one control, one CAD and one CAA sample. Of the 17 groups, 5 were randomly selected and the samples from these groups were pooled based on the sample type for iTRAQ analyses in order to detect significantly differentially expressed proteins. The other 12 groups were analyzed via western blotting. All experiments and validation procedures are summarized in in Fig. 2.
